標題： 【Promote the event!活動推推】東華永續講座暨市集 From University to Infinity -Sustainable Practices in NDHU
日期： Tue, 14 Nov 2023 17:22:16 +0800
附檔： 永續講座暨市集主視覺海報.jpg (74 KB)   一般用邀請函.jpg (431 KB)   
大家好，

繼去年北上舉辦免費永續講座，國立東華大學112年11月18日（週六）將再度至臺北松山文創園區舉辦免費永續講座暨市集活動，7位講者 × 4場專題講座，分享東華推動可持續發展理念和在地實踐成果，及邀請東華畢業校友、在學學生和其他響應無塑好夥伴，匯聚的小型永續市集。

誠摯歡迎對永續議題、大學社會責任（USR）感興趣的你、想瞭解國立東華大學學院、學系資訊的你，或思親，想看看久違不見東華家人的你蒞臨，感受「洄瀾底蘊 東華永續」！但是，請務必 / 一定要帶著環保杯、餐具或購物袋一起來喔。謝謝。

永續講座暨市集詳細訊息，請點閱下列網址
https://www.accupass.com/event/2310300105539584666510

※ 活動免費入場。
※ 受限於場地空間，懇請提前報名講座，請此連結報名➡https://iso2u.cc/ndhu2023forum
※ 現場備有茶水及蔬食小點，請參與講座的大家自備環保杯 / 餐具 / 購物袋參與。自備購物袋至市集現場的「充滿希望的五味屋」攤位消費還可享優惠。活動現場將不使用一次性餐具及提供瓶裝飲用水。
※ 為維護古蹟建築安全，松山文創園區室內外空間全面禁止吸菸（包含電子菸），敬請配合。

Dear all,

Following last year's free sustainability forum held in Songshan Cultural and Creative Park, Taipei, National Dong Hwa University (NDHU) will once again organize a free sustainability forum and a market event in North Tobacco Factory, Taipei's Songshan Cultural and Creative Park on November 18, 2023 (Saturday). We have four sessions with seven speakers, each sharing Dong Hwa's commitment to sustainable development and local achievements. We also invite Dong Hwa alumni, current students, and other partners who support plastic-free to join this small-scale sustainability market.

We sincerely welcome those interested in sustainability issues and university social responsibility (USR), as well as those who want to know more about the colleges and departments of NDHU. If you're thinking of visiting and reconnecting with your long-lost Dong Hwa family, please come and experience "From University to Infinity -Sustainable Practices in NDHU" However, please remember to bring your eco-friendly cup, utensils, or shopping bags with you. We appreciate your efforts for the earth.

For detailed information about this event, please visit the following link:
https://www.accupass.com/event/2310300105539584666510

Notes:
1. Admission to the event is free.
2. Due to limited space, we kindly ask you to register for the lectures in advance. Please register using this link ➡ https://iso2u.cc/ndhu2023forum
3. Tea and vegetarian snacks will be available on-site. Please bring your own eco-friendly cup, utensils, and shopping bags. If you bring your shopping bag to the "5wayhouse" booth at the market, you can earn discounts. Disposable utensils will not be used, and bottled drinking water will not be provided at the event.
4. To ensure the safety of the historical building, smoking (including e-cigarettes) is strictly prohibited indoors and outdoors at Songshan Cultural and Creative Park. Your cooperation is greatly appreciated.
5. Sustainability lecture sessions are conducted in Chinese. Thank you very much.
